title: and Valuation (Amendment) Act 2022 (Commencement of Certain Provisions)
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Planning and Development, Maritime
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Planning and Development, Maritime 
and Valuation (Amendment) Act 2022 (Commencement of Certain Provisions) 
(No. 2) Order 2022.
text_norm: 1 order may cited planning development maritime valuation (amendment) act 2022 (commencement certain provisions) (no 2) order 2022

title: and Valuation (Amendment) Act 2022 (Commencement of Certain Provisions)
heading: 2. The 1st day of October 2022 is appointed as the day on which sections
text_raw:
2. The 1st day of October 2022 is appointed as the day on which sections 
71, 72 and 73 of the Planning and Development, Maritime and Valuation 
(Amendment) Act 2022 (No. 29 of 2022) shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

29 September, 2022. 

DARRAGH O’BRIEN, 

Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 7th October, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [487] 3
